name: 弗罗里安·穆特鲁
name_full: 弗罗里安·穆特鲁 Florian Munteanu

last_movies.title: 维京传奇：英灵神殿 第三季
维京传奇：英灵神殿 第二季

introduction: Florian Munteanu, aka, “Big Nasty” is a Romanian boxer, actor, and fitness star originally born and raised in Germany.Growing up, Florian was by raised parents who were extremely active and health-conscious. His father, who was a boxer and athlete, encouraged Florian to practice sports from an early age.As he grew older, Florian decided to focus on boxing and fitness, two of his passions. He’d work out in the gym several times per week, in addition to practicing boxing.Throughout the years of training, Florian sculpted a formidable physique. Standing at 6’4” tall and weighing around 245lbs, he soon became sought after in the film and fitness industry – leading to his role of Ivan Drago’s son in boxing drama movie Creed II.Weight:235 - 245lbs (106.6 - 111.1kg)	Height:6'4" (193cm)	Age	Date of Birth:28	October 13, 1990Nationality:Romanian, German	Profession:Professional Boxer, Actor	Alias:Big Nasty来自我只是搬运工
